Welcome to Mariner’s documentation!¶

you can use the app.features.model.controller.naive_check_forward_exception function:

app.features.model.controller.naive_check_forward_exception(db: sqlalchemy.orm.session.Session, config: app.features.model.schema.configs.ModelSchema) → app.features.model.controller.ForwardCheck¶

Given a model config, run it through a small set of the dataset and return the exception if any. It does not mean the training will run smoothly for all examples of the dataset, but it gives some confidence about the model trainability
